description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, running pre/post-processing scripts, and copying template files with variable replacements. It supports various project types such as React, Angular, Django, and database schemas, and includes a main function demonstrating project setup.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps: PRE_PROCESSING and POST_PROCESSING.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Manages template locations and access, providing template paths based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, defining methods for validation, structure generation, testing setup, and processing scripts.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for registering and creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main orchestrator class for initializing projects, registering templates, and waiting for post-processing completion.

classes.name: AndroidTemplate
classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Android projects.

classes.name: AngularTemplate
classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Angular projects.

classes.name: AstroTemplate
classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Astro projects.

classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Django projects.

classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Express.js projects.

classes.name: FastAPITemplate
classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for FastAPI projects.

classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Flask projects.

classes.description: Implementation of ProjectTemplate for Flutter projects.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class for copying files and directories with variable replacements.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the project by validating parameters, running pre/post scripts, generating structure, and setting up testing.

methods.name: run_pre_processing
methods.description: Runs the pre-processing script if defined.

methods.name: run_post_processing
methods.description: Runs the post-processing script if defined.

methods.name: _run_processing_script
methods.description: Executes a script in background or foreground, managing status files and logs.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete within a timeout period.
